definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
all-purpose flour/flour for making dumplings and noodles

sentences.english: What happens when you mix flour with water?
sentences.chinese: 你混合水和面粉的时候会发生什么事呢？

sentences.english: We are trying to help out by delivering flour to bakeries.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在设法给面包店送去面粉，帮助它们度过难关。

sentences.english: Put the flour in the bowl and then beat the eggs in.
sentences.chinese: 进一些面粉，然后打几只鸡蛋搅拌进去。

sentences.english: It is used to thicken sauces and stews in place of flour and fat.
sentences.chinese: 它常用来勾芡酱汁，及在炖菜中取代面粉和脂肪。

sentences.english: He shoplifted a bag of flour.
sentences.chinese: 他在商店里偷窃了一袋面粉。

sentences.english: Spread some flour on the table and roll the pastry out very thin .
sentences.chinese: 在桌子上撒些面粉把馅饼皮擀得很薄。

sentences.english: Slowly pour in the flour, stir well.
sentences.chinese: 慢慢倒进面粉，边加边拌匀。

sentences.english: The dough will tell you when it is ready by the way it feels in your hands.
sentences.chinese: 当好了的时候，面粉在你手中的感觉就会告诉你。
谷物和面粉都是种类物。

sentences.english: She enriched the gravy with a little flour browned in butter.
sentences.chinese: 她用一些在黄油中炒过的面粉给肉汁调味。

sentences.english: You can make glue from flour and water.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用面粉和水调制糨糊。

sentences.english: Sift the flour into a bowl with the salt.
sentences.chinese: 把面粉筛进碗里，和盐拌匀。

sentences.english: Remove from heat and stir in the flour, baking soda, and almonds until well mixed.
sentences.chinese: 离火拌入面粉，苏打粉，还有杏仁片，混合均匀。

sentences.english: To make the cake, first measure out 200 grams of flour and 75 grams of butter.
sentences.chinese: 做蛋糕先要量取二百克面粉和七十五克奶油。

sentences.english: Grab an airtight container and plant your flour in the refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 拿一个密闭容器并移入您的面粉放置于冰箱中。
